title: summer internship
content: Does a summer internship between June and July carry 2 credits if we do it, and will it increase my CGPA a little?

comments.body: Yup, summer internships will add 2 credits. Whether they increase your GPA or not depends on your internship grade. You can't get a C grade and expect your GPA to go up lol.
But they donâ€™t add the credits till 8th sem right??
Unrelated to the topic but I've read in another comment of yours that you interned from CCBD, what is the lowest possible grades that are given here?
Yup, all internship and summer course credits reflect only in your final semester.
Theoretically, any letter grade from S to F. However, I haven't heard of anyone getting lower than an A from their internship.
